name: Covid Shot
description: This is a basic VR game for Quest 2.  It is designed to provide a more immersive idea of how much relative protection masks/vaccines/nothing provide from Covid-19.  Players stand in a room and have to use two hip mounted blasters to shoot Covid particles.  The number of particles are relative to the degree of protection a player opts to simulate, with scaling factors based on scientific studies of mask/vaccine effectiveness.  There are four levels of protection (i.e. difficulty).  The easiest level is for players that opt to simulate wearing a mask and having a vaccine.  The medium level is for players that opt to simulate having a vaccine.  The hard level is for players that opt to simulate wearing a mask.  The nightmare level is for players that opt for no protective measures.
